title: Panasonic’s new Beard Trimmer ER-GB80/70/60
description:
This new beard trimmer features a Precision Trimmer which is convenient for detailed styling such as 
grooming a moustache or soul patch. Also useful for cutting sideburns and long hairs. (only ER-GB80&70)

Durable stainless steel blades with an acute 45° edge enable precise cutting. Sharp cutting edges quickly cut even thick and hard hairs.

asset.author: Channel Panasonic - Official
asset.description:
posted on http://ch.panasonic.net on: Jul, 31, 2014
This new beard trimmer features a Precision Trimmer which is convenient for detailed styling such as 
grooming a moustache or soul patch. Also useful for cutting sideburns and long hairs. (only ER-GB80&70)

Durable stainless steel blades with an acute 45° edge enable precise cutting. Sharp cutting edges quickly cut even thick and hard hairs.

transcripts: Give your beard some style, any style. Panasonic trimmer, comb attachment give you precision control over hair length, the dial has 39 length steps, from 0.5-20mm. Use the 1-10mm comb attachment to trim your beard with precision, use the 11-20mm  comb attachment to clip your sides and neck line. The 45 degree angle blade ensures a sharp accurate trim.  Use the slide up accurate trim to complete your style. Trim delicate areas with the body hair comb attachment. Since it's washable the trimmer stays clean and tidy, Panasonic trimmers continue to evolve. Panasonic.
